ODESolver module

class src.vLab.IntegratedBioprocess.ODESolver.BaseOdeSolver(bioreactor_param, chromatography_param, solver_name='julia', method='CVODE_BDF', **kwargs)[source]

Bases: object

Base class for plantwise simulation

Parameters

  • bioreactor_param (CellCultureModel) – bioreactor parameters

  • chromatography_param (ChromatographyModel) – chromatography parameters

  • solver_name (str) – use either julia or python

  • method (str) – integration method to use.

  • kwargs – other parameters

property get_solver_info

get solver information
